Package net.emuman.spigotutils.animatedtext

Class TextWipeAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.emuman.spigotutils.animatedtext.TextAnimation
      • net.emuman.spigotutils.animatedtext.TextWipeAnimation
  • public class TextWipeAnimation
extends TextAnimation
    A class that allows text to be wrapped in an animation, represented by a String supplier. A wipe animation is characterized by a linear transition between two colors, with any number of specified intermediaries.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class net.emuman.spigotutils.animatedtext.TextAnimation

        maxStage

      TextWipeAnimation​(java.lang.String text, org.bukkit.ChatColor color1, org.bukkit.ChatColor color2, int period)
      Creates a new TextWipeAnimation with no intermediaries.
      TextWipeAnimation​(java.lang.String text, org.bukkit.ChatColor color1, org.bukkit.ChatColor color2, java.util.List<org.bukkit.ChatColor> intermediaries)
      Creates a new TextWipeAnimation, with no given period.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextWipeAnimation

        public TextWipeAnimation​(java.lang.String text,
                         org.bukkit.ChatColor color1,
                         org.bukkit.ChatColor color2,
                         java.util.List<org.bukkit.ChatColor> intermediaries,
                         int period)
        Creates a new TextWipeAnimation. The period is only used for optional external reference and is not mandatory.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be animated.
        color1 - the primary color of the text (before the wipe).
        color2 - the secondary color of the text (after the wipe).
        intermediaries - the set of colors to act as intermediaries between the two colors.
        period - the period of the text animation.

      • TextWipeAnimation

        public TextWipeAnimation​(java.lang.String text,
                         org.bukkit.ChatColor color1,
                         org.bukkit.ChatColor color2,
                         java.util.List<org.bukkit.ChatColor> intermediaries)
        Creates a new TextWipeAnimation, with no given period.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be animated.
        color1 - the primary color of the text (before the wipe).
        color2 - the secondary color of the text (after the wipe).
        intermediaries - the set of colors to act as intermediaries between the two colors.

      • TextWipeAnimation

        public TextWipeAnimation​(java.lang.String text,
                         org.bukkit.ChatColor color1,
                         org.bukkit.ChatColor color2,
                         int period)
        Creates a new TextWipeAnimation with no intermediaries. The period is only used for optional external reference and is not mandatory.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be animated.
        color1 - the primary color of the text (before the wipe).
        color2 - the secondary color of the text (after the wipe).
        period - the period of the text animation.
